name: Beyond the Wall
description: Classic point-and-click adventure with a magical atmosphere and captivating music. You ring your friend's doorbell, but still, no one opens, although the light is on? Discover what happens one summer’s night Beyond the Wall of the garden with the tall house. Immerse yourself into a mysterious world where fantasy meets reality with a pinch of humor. Solve puzzles, collect items, and overcome obstacles that await you on your journey in thirteen unique levels Beyond the Wall.
